error.message: Violation of PRIMARY KEY constraint 'PK__Taifex__1F3CF1229D6CF0D9'. Cannot insert duplicate key in object 'dbo.Taifex'. The duplicate key value is (Mar 31 2017 12:00AM). The statement has been terminated.
